sentences.sContent: Her sister was always more of an extrovert.

remMethod.val: extro(外) + vert(转) → 向外转的人 → 性格外向的人

words.tran: 性格外向的；外向性的；喜社交的
外向的；向外翻的；外倾的
[心理] 外向性；[医] 外翻

trans.tranCn: 性格外向的人； 爱交际的人
trans.tranOther: someone who is active and confident, and who enjoys spending time with other people
